name: you as a baby simulator
description:
Remember?

This is a small 15 minute game of you as a baby 


My tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mrferretgames
Meme master: https://www.tiktok.com/@mestreensinador1


Game is free but set to pay what you want.

Any proceeds go to me at the moment. I have e-mailed @mestreensinador1 to offer him 50% of any donations I get here(if any) but I have had no reply. The only interaction I had with him is he said "god bless" on one of my tiktoks. So hopefully he accepts because he deserves it more than me!
I made this game in 5 days while maintaining a full time job so go easy <3

https://twitter.com/mrferretgames
